text: Tara pichata yetiya yakaraiyya'i ibadata kaksata chalatata thiya haichila, tetiya phiraistasakale te'omka ahbana karai ka’le, ‘niscaya allahe aponaka iyaha'iyara susambada diche, te'om ha’ba allahara taraphara paraa agamanakrta eta kalimara satyayanakarai, neta, bhoga asaktimukta arau punyabanasakalara antarbhukta ejana nabi’
